column1: The Purple Pig////milk braised pork shoulder- this was very good. the pork is very tender and the sauce was rich and perfectly salted. it was a good mix getting the beets and pork shoulder as they complemented each other. however
column2: you can probably do a great job of making pork shoulder that is more or less as tasty
column3: so I would probably try something else on the menu if I come back
